title: Login Issues
body:
Havent played for about 6 months.

I come back on and do the updates but when i go to log in it says 'cant connect with server, retrying'

it attempts that 3 times then says sorry couldn't log in sort of thing, has anyone come across this?

replies.body: Happens every now and then, it become reasonably common now. Just like crashing at loading screen and disconnecting from the store, it's all becoming more and more common so we're kinda used to it now :(
That happens every now and then to me, I just try logging in again and it works unless there's a problem with the server.
